chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
i: nat
δ: X
ρ: X
P: code

Goal:
(i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> (i, δ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ = δ

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (vw : VectorDef.t ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v w where ?A : [X : Type i : nat ρ : X δ : X P : code |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat ρ : X δ : X P : code |- nat] ?m : [X : Type i : nat ρ : X δ : X P : code |- nat]
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.Desc_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (a : ?A), VectorDef.cons ?A a (?n + ?m) (VectorDef.append v w) = VectorDef.append (VectorDef.cons ?A a ?n v) w where ?A : [X : Type i : nat ρ : X δ : X P : code |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat ρ : X δ : X P : code |- nat] ?m : [X : Type i : nat ρ : X δ : X P : code |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [X : Type i : nat ρ : X δ : X P : code |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat ρ : X δ : X P : code |- nat]
VectorDef.splitat : forall l r : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (l + r) -> VectorDef.t ?A l * VectorDef.t ?A r where ?A : [X : Type i : nat ρ : X δ : X P : code |- Type]
Lexicographic_Exponentiation.ltl_unit : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (x : list A) (a b : A), Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (x ++ a :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (x ++ a :: nil) (b :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x (b :: nil)
Relation_Operators.d_conc : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)
Lexicographic_Exponentiation.desc_end : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (a b : A) (x : list A), Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (x ++ a :: nil) /\ Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (x ++ a :: nil) (b :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A leA a b
nat_sorted_rect : forall P : list nat -> Type, P nil -> (forall x : nat, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : nat) (l : list nat), x < y -> P (y :: l) -> P (x :: y :: l)) -> forall l : list nat, nat_sorted l -> P l
Inductive Desc (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := d_nil : Relation_Operators.Desc A leA nil | d_one : forall x : A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (x :: nil) | d_conc : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil) Arguments Relation_Operators.Desc _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_one _%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.d_conc _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _%list_scope
Permutation.Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, l ~p l0 -> P l l0
subcode = fun P (Q : nat * list X) => let (i, li) := P in let (n, code) := Q in exists l r : list X, code = l ++ li ++ r /\ i = n + length l : code -> nat * list X -> Prop Arguments subcode _ _ /
Lexicographic_Exponentiation.desc_tail : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (x : list A) (a b : A), Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (b :: x ++ a :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A leA a b
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
rev_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (l ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, P l
rev_list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P (rev l) -> P (rev (a :: l))) -> forall l : list A, P (rev l)
Lexicographic_Exponentiation.desc_prefix : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (x : list A) (a : A), Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (x ++ a :: nil) -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA x
ZifyClasses.rew_iff : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> P -> Q
BinPos.Pos.max_case_strong : forall (n m : BinNums.positive) (P : BinNums.positive -> Type), (BinPos.Pos.le m n -> P n) -> (BinPos.Pos.le n m -> P m) -> P (BinPos.Pos.max n m)
in_code = fun (i : nat) P => code_start P <= i < code_end P : nat -> code -> Prop Arguments in_code _%nat_scope _ /
out_code = fun (i : nat) P => i < code_start P \/ code_end P <= i : nat -> code -> Prop Arguments out_code _%nat_scope _ /
in_out_code : forall (i : nat) P, in_code i P -> out_code i P -> False
BinPos.Pos.SqrtSpec_sind : forall P : BinNums.positive * BinPos.Pos.mask -> BinNums.positive -> SProp, (forall s x : BinNums.positive, x = BinPos.Pos.mul s s -> P (s, BinPos.Pos.IsNul) x) -> (forall s r x : BinNums.positive, x = BinPos.Pos.add (BinPos.Pos.mul s s) r -> BinPos.Pos.le r (BinNums.xO s) -> P (s, BinPos.Pos.IsPos r) x) -> forall (p : BinNums.positive * BinPos.Pos.mask) (p0 : BinNums.positive), BinPos.Pos.SqrtSpec p p0 -> P p p0
BinPos.Pos.SqrtSpec_ind : forall P : BinNums.positive * BinPos.Pos.mask -> BinNums.positive -> Prop, (forall s x : BinNums.positive, x = BinPos.Pos.mul s s -> P (s, BinPos.Pos.IsNul) x) -> (forall s r x : BinNums.positive, x = BinPos.Pos.add (BinPos.Pos.mul s s) r -> BinPos.Pos.le r (BinNums.xO s) -> P (s, BinPos.Pos.IsPos r) x) -> forall (p : BinNums.positive * BinPos.Pos.mask) (p0 : BinNums.positive), BinPos.Pos.SqrtSpec p p0 -> P p p0

```coq
intros H1 H2.
inversion H1 as [H3 H4].
inversion H2 as [H5 H6].
rewrite <- H4 in H6.
rewrite <- H5 in H4.
rewrite VectorSpec.append_comm_cons in H4.
rewrite VectorSpec.append_comm_cons in H6.
inversion H4 as [H7 H8].
inversion H6 as [H9 H10].
rewrite VectorSpec.eta in H7.
rewrite VectorSpec.eta in H9.
inversion H7 as [H11 H12].
inversion H9 as [H13 H14].
rewrite H11 in H12.
rewrite H13 in H14.
injection H12.
injection H14.
intros H15.
rewrite H15 in *.
reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: intros H1 H2. inversion H1 as [H3 H4]. inversion H2 as [H5 H6]. rewrite <- H4 in H6. rewrite <- H5 in H4. rewrite VectorSpec.append_comm_cons in H4. rewrite VectorSpec.append_comm_cons in H6. inversion H4 as [H7 H8]. inversion H6 as [H9 H10]. rewrite VectorSpec.eta in H7. rewrite VectorSpec.eta in H9. inversion H7 as [H11 H12]. inversion H9 as [H13 H14]. rewrite H11 in H12. rewrite H13 in H14. injection H12. injection H14. intros H15. rewrite H15 in *. reflexivity.
